title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: On linux, running build 20011127, when a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the tool items (pulldown menu icon and close icon) move below the label.
EB: These two tool items should stay on the same line as the label, no matter how small the view gets. Users expect the close button to be on the same line as the label and located to the far right corner.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the Navigator view on linux with build 20011127. 2. Resize the view to a smaller size. 3. Observe that the tool items (pulldown menu icon and close icon) move below the label.
